articles.title: Thaad: Why is the US giving Israel a powerful anti-missile system - BBC.com
articles.description: The move has been the focus of attention as it involves putting American boots on the ground in Israel.
articles.content:
The Pentagon has confirmed it is sending a high-altitude anti-missile system operated by US troops to Israel.
Officials say the Terminal High-Altitude Area Defense (Thaad) battery will bolster Israe… [+5861 chars]
